Sting.onHit: (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target is stable but Poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining Hit Points, and is Paralyzed while Poisoned in this way.
